name: project
description: A set of commands for managing TicketBird projects used to help organize tickets

options.name: add
options.description: Adds a new project that users can select when opening tickets. Up to 25

options.name: name
options.description: The name of the new project.

options.name: prefix
options.description: A prefix to help identify tickets for this project. 16 characters max, alphanumeric allowed

options.name: remove
options.description: Deletes an existing project from TicketBird

options.name: view
options.description: View info about a specific project

options.name: prefix
options.description: The new prefix for the project. 16 characters max, alphanumeric allowed

options.name: edit-info
options.description: If true, will open a modal to edit the additional info (default: false)

options.name: ping-override
options.description: Override global ping settings for this project

choices.name: No override - Use global ping setting (default)

options.name: staff-user
options.description: A user to add or remove as staff on this project

options.name: staff-role
options.description: A role to add or remove as staff on this project

options.name: remove-all-staff
options.description: Whether to remove all existing staff from this project (default: false)
